job.title: Kafka developer
job.description: Should have worked in a Devops/ Agile environment.<br><br>Proven experience in creation, deployment & use of a Kafka environment.<br><br>Proven expertise in building and integrating large clustered Kafka environments.<br><br>Proven experience coding & deploying Kafka streams.<br><br>Experience with AWS, CI/CD and programming.<br><br>Knowledge if confluent or Kafka<br><br>Experience with Ansible<br><br>Knowledge of General Web Infrastructure (tomcat, jboss etc..)<br><br>Knowledge om Elastic search, Splunk will be an added<br><br>
